original_title: Die Leibstandarte SS-Adolf Hitler im Einsatz
overview: Chronicles combat action of Hitler's elite bodyguard regiment from 1940 to 1941. From Rotterdam to Greece, German frontline cameramen captured footage of early victorious campaigns. Scenes of camp life and ceremonies convey an impression of the comradeship, pride, and elan of this mighty military formation.
title: Leibstandarte-SS Adolf Hitler In Action
